text: 3.16: Mt 3.11; FG 13.25Mbe mba ndɨkndɨgi ga mbuim, Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Gu mbɨn nde ruai, na zɨn zi guma, ana guigira ŋkasŋka bakɨme ki. Gu vhɨra ana ŋkarve nɨman ŋguav ana ŋkari sharive mpiiŋ fhɨrgirga tuktɨgi fhu. Ana Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar gum vhavar nde ruarga.
